name: Call For Paper: GSTF Journal of Nursing and Health Care (JNHC) Vol.3 No.2
content: The Global Science and Technology Forum (GSTF) publishes, in print and online, international journals that feature peer-reviewed scholarly articles rigorously selected from conferences and open call for papers. These articles are the end result of scholars’ tremendous effort and creativeness in exploring the theory, application, and social implications of diverse frontier research areas in science and technology. GSTF journals are indexed by Ulrichsweb, EconBiz, EBSCO, CrossRef, ProQuest, Cabell’s Directories, Index Copernicus,JournalSeek and will be submitted to Zentralblatt MATH, Scopus, ScienceDirect and amongst others, where applicable. GSTF has partnered with Springer and Business Media to publish their journals on Springer’s Open Access publishing platform for independent journals – Global Science Journals (GSJ). It now provides a sustainable, reliable and importantly, highly visible home for GSTF journals to ensure the maximum visibility, usage and citations to our Authors articles.
